content.question: Which of the following best supports Critchlow’s assertion about the Republican Party?

choices.label: The end of the Cold War
The 1980 election of Ronald Reagan as president
The continued expansion of Great Society programs
The political scandals under Richard Nixon’s administration in the 1970s

content.answer: The 1980 election of Ronald Reagan as president

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
